title: BRIEF-Uranium Participation Corp Estimates Net Asset Value At Sept 30, 2019 Was C$612.1 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Uranium Participation Corp Estimates Net Asset Value At Sept 30, 2019 Was C$612.1 Mln

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 04, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Uranium Participation Corp Estimates Net Asset Value At Sept 30, 2019 Was C$612.1 Mln Oct 4 (Reuters) - Participation Corp : * URANIUM PARTICIPATION CORPORATION REPORTS ESTIMATED NET ASSET VALUE AT SEPTEMBER 30, 2019 * URANIUM PARTICIPATION CORP - ESTIMATED NET ASSET VALUE AT SEPTEMBER 30, 2019 WAS CAD$612.1 MILLION OR CAD$4.43 PER SHARE

BRIEF-Uranium Participation Corp Estimates Net Asset Value At Sept 30, 2019 Was C$612.1 Mln
